description: Ariana Grande's talent manager Scooter Braun is slated to host a fundraiser for Hillary Clinton in Los Angeles on August 6, a source told The Hollywood Reporter Thursday.
title: Ariana Grande's Manager to Host Hillary Clinton Fundraiser
title_page: Ariana Grande's Manager to Host Hillary Clinton Fundraiser
text:
It must have been a busy week for talent manager Scooter Braun, who represents several of today’s top recording artists, including pop singer Ariana Grande.
When he wasn’t doing damage control for “doughnut gate,” this week, Braun was busy preparing to host Hillary Clinton an August 6 Fundraiser.
Braun is slated to host a fundraiser for Hillary Clinton in Los Angeles on August 6, a source told The Hollywood Reporter Thursday.
If the event goes as planned, the turnout will be a large crowd of young Hollywood millenials, per THR.
Braun also represents singers Justin Bieber, Carly Rae Jespen, and a slew of other up-and-coming recording artists.
The event will mark Hillary’s third fundraising appearance in Los Angeles since she announced her candidacy.
The former Secretary of State was last in SOCAL on June 19, where she raised funds at actor Tobey Maguire’s home.
That event sold out with 250 tickets priced at $2,700 per plate.
Leonardo DiCaprio, Elizabeth Banks, and singer Sia were all in attendance.
No word if Grande will be in attendance for the August 6 fundraiser.
